reviewText: because it was very pleasing we were very fond of that show,they really put on a great show couldn't ask for more

Bowfire is perhaps the most unique and versatile group to hit the music scene in a long time.  All the members are individual virtuosos and all have careers outside the group, but together they create a show that is as good as it gets.  This recording is an excellent representation of the live show, but see them live if they come to your town.  The electricity of the live performance goes way betond what a video can capture!

I saw part of a Bowfire concert while PBS was having one of their "begathons". They were so impressive I had to have the DVD. The Amazon price was good and the DVD is a fantastic performance. If they ever do a show in Philadelphia I'll be buying a couple of tickets. Until then the DVD will have to do. I'm not disappointed at all with the DVD. I love it!

A truly moving experience.  How can so much talent be assembled for one concert?  If you love good music, from classic to country, you will enjoy the color and pagentry, the sheer joy of excellent production and amazing sound.  I never tire of really good music.  This immediately joined the ranks of my favorites.
So many bows, so little time
I saw Bowfire live and it was an incredible show.  This is a suitable AV version but nothing like the live show.
SAw them live.  But so nice to have this wonderful dvd to share with friends.
WE WANT MORE OF THEIR WORK. WHAT A MARVELOUS GROUP OF INSTRUMENTALISTS!!!!!!!!
I saw this group in concert several years ago and was thoroughly entertained.  Clearly, each one is amazingly talented in his own right and, when playing together, simply extraordinary.
Very nice enjoyed it very much.
SIMPLY, ONE OF THE BEST MUSICAL LIVE PERFORMANCES I HAVE SEEN. THE MUSIC AND PERFORMERS WERE  FANTASTIC, AND I AM A DISCERNING MUSICIAN MYSELF. A MUST SEE FOR MUSIC LOVERS!
Awesome concert! An incredible gift fo give or receive! Audio and Video is technically superb. A rare combination of talent and content

My husband and I went to see Bowfire when they came to Memphis,Tennessee and it was awesome!  We had to order this DVD so that we could watch them anytime.  There is so much talent in this awesome group.  We watch it over and over.

Amazing virtuosity. However, I recall the great wit Samuel Johnson was invited to the debut performance of a violinist .When asked to say some words of encouragement to the young man, he said "The piece you chose was extremely difficult ...I only wish it had been impossible."  When Bowfire  picks challenging pieces that sound like tortured cats, the ghost of Samuel Johnson winces.
